# windows

**Instance Property**

An array of all the windows in the structure.

## Declaration

```swift
var windows: [CapturedStructure.Surface] { get }
```

## Inspecting structure details

- **identifier**: A unique alphanumeric value that the framework assigns the structure.
- **rooms**: An array of all the captured rooms in the structure.
- **floors**: An array of all the floors in the structure.
- **CapturedStructure.Surface**: The type a captured structure assigns to surfaces.
- **doors**: An array of all the doors in the structure.
- **objects**: An array of all the objects in the structure.
- **CapturedStructure.Object**: The type a captured structure assigns to objects.
- **openings**: An array of all the openings in the structure.
- **walls**: An array of all the walls in the structure.
- **sections**: One or more room types that the framework identifies in the structure.
- **CapturedStructure.Section**: The type a captured structure assigns to distinct room areas.
- **version**: A version number for the captured structure.
